english: I have been waiting for your salvation , o lord
chinese: 耶和华阿，我向来等候你的救恩。

english: Why , his salvation will take away your guilt
chinese: ?的救恩要除掉你的罪，要除掉你的沮丧。

english: And all flesh will see the salvation of god
chinese: 凡有血气的、都要见神的救恩。

english: Oh that the salvation of israel were come out of zion
chinese: 但愿以色列的救恩从锡安而出。

english: And all flesh shall see the salvation of god
chinese: 6凡是血气的，都要见神的救恩。
救恩造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Because it is from the jews that saivation comes
chinese: 因为救恩是从犹太人出来的

english: Thank you , master , for your saving grace
chinese: 感谢您，师父，感谢您的仁慈救恩。

english: Because it is from the jews that saivation comes
chinese: 因为救恩是从犹太人出来的

english: I have waited for thy salvation , o lord
chinese: 18耶和华阿，我向来等候你的救恩。

english: " i look for your deliverance , o lord
chinese: 18耶和华阿，我向来等候你的救恩。

english: Salvation , now that s the ultimate miracle
chinese: 救恩，那是最终极的神迹。

english: With joy you will draw water from the wells of salvation
chinese: 3所以你们必从救恩的泉源欢然取水。

english: So with joy will you get water out of the springs of salvation
chinese: 所以你们必从救恩的泉源欢然取水。

english: 81 my soul fainteth for thy salvation : but i hope in thy word
chinese: 81我心渴想你的救恩、仰望你的应许。

english: Because they had no faith in god , and no hope in his salvation
chinese: 因为他们不信服神，不倚赖他的救恩。
